mapper.sql: select a.AGENT_ID ,a.CMD_ID ,a.SEQ ,a.CMD_DATE ,a.EXE_DATE ,a.PARAM_VALUE ,a.REG_USER as CONSOLE_REG_USER ,a.RS_CD ,a.RS_DATE ,a.RS_MSG ,b.CMD_NM ,b.CMD_CD ,b.MOD_DATE ,b.MOD_USER ,b.PARAMS ,b.COMMENTS ,b.REG_DATE ,b.REG_USER from TIM0213 a inner join TIM0214 b on a.CMD_ID = b.CMD_ID
mapper.insert: insert into TIM0213 ( AGENT_ID ,CMD_ID ,CMD_DATE ,SEQ ,EXE_DATE ,PARAM_VALUE ,REG_USER ,RS_CD ) select a.AGENT_ID ,(select max(CMD_ID) from TIM0214 where CMD_CD = #{command.commandCd}) ,#{commandDate} ,(select coalesce(max(SEQ),0) + 1 from TIM0213 where AGENT_ID = a.AGENT_ID and CMD_ID = (select max(CMD_ID) from TIM0214 where CMD_CD = #{command.commandCd}) and CMD_DATE = #{commandDate}) ,#{executeDate} ,#{paramValue} ,#{regUser} ,'0' from TIM0211 a where a.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.select: select count (a.CMD_ID) as cnt from TIM0213 a inner join TIM0211 b on a.AGENT_ID = b.AGENT_ID and b.AGENT_NM = #{agentNm} and b.DEL_YN = 'N' and a.CMD_DATE >= to_char(sysdate - 1,'yyyymmddhh24') || '0000' and a.RS_CD = '0' inner join TIM0214 c on a.CMD_ID = c.CMD_ID and c.CMD_CD = #{cmdCd}
mapper.update: update TIM0201 set IP = #{serverIp} , MOD_DATE = #{modDate}, MOD_USER = #{modId} where SERVER_ID = (SELECT SERVER_ID FROM TIM0211 WHERE AGENT_ID = #{agentId})
